concise_definition: n. (人名) 莉兹（Elizabeth 的昵称)

definitions.explanation_en: A common diminutive or nickname for the given name Elizabeth, used informally in personal and social contexts.
definitions.explanation_cn: 人名 Elizabeth 的常见昵称或简称，多用于非正式的个人或社交场合。
definitions.example_en: Liz is organizing the team lunch this Friday.
definitions.example_cn: 莉兹正在组织这周五的团队午餐。
